title: In California, can I subpoena Bank of America for bank records on a small claims judgment?
question: I have a judgment from small claims, writ of execution against an old landlord. I am 99% sure he banks with BofA. Can I just send the Sheriff there to serve the writ at the bank or can I subpoena the records? I am afraid if I just serve a subpoena, he will move any money there and hide it.
answers: Don't waste time with subpoena, just serve the garnishment.
answer_card_text:
Answer
